titleStmt.title: Songs of 3.4.5. and 6. parts by Thomas Tomkins ...
titleStmt.author: Tomkins, Thomas, 1572-1656.
Croce, Giovanni, ca. 1557-1609. Musica sacra.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Matthew Lownes, Iohn Brovvne, and Thomas Snodham,

notesStmt.note: Each pt.--cantus, altus, tenor, quintus, sextus and bassus--has t.p.
Signatures: A-D⁴, ²A-D⁴, ³A² ³B-D⁴, ⁴[A]² ⁴B-C⁴, ⁵[A]² ⁵B⁴, ⁶A-D⁴.
Bound with incomplete copy (cantus, altus and tenor pts. only) of Giovanni Croce's "Musica sacra" (STC 6040). Complete copy can be found at reel 954:7.
Reproduction of original in the Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
